name: receptively

in a way that shows that you are willing to listen to and accept new ideas and suggestions: The possibility was greeted receptively by some Republicans. The salesperson asks questions to find out about you, and listens receptively, with a lot of head nodding.
education, language
  specialized in a way that relates to the ability to understand language, rather than produce it: Pronunciation plays a key role in successful communication, both productively and receptively. Compare
productively
